    • bDatesOverlapping

      public static boolean bDatesOverlapping​(java.time.ZonedDateTime startUtc, java.time.ZonedDateTime endUtc, int referenceApptId)
      Checks to see if a start and end date time overlap with an existing appointment
      Parameters:
      startUtc - Start date/tome
      endUtc - End date/time
      referenceApptId - Existing appointment's id, enter -1 if not checking against existing appointment
      Returns:
      True if overlapping an existing appointment, excluding referenced appointment.

    • isOverlapping

      private static boolean isOverlapping​(java.time.ZonedDateTime start1, java.time.ZonedDateTime end1, java.time.ZonedDateTime start2, java.time.ZonedDateTime end2)
      Check to see if two date ranges overlap
      Parameters:
      start1 - Start of first date range
      end1 - End of first date range
      start2 - Start of second date range
      end2 - End of second date range
      Returns:
      True if ranges overlap, otherwise false

    • isDuringBusinessHours

      public static boolean isDuringBusinessHours​(java.time.ZonedDateTime start, java.time.ZonedDateTime end)
      Checks to see if ZoneDateTime range is between 8AM and 10PM US Eastern time during the week
      Parameters:
      start - Beginning of date range
      end - End of date range
      Returns:
      True if date range falls within business hours
